Because of the price, I set the bar low in expectations and I wasn’t disappointed.  It fit well enough.  There were some loose threads and a couple of imperfections, especially around the sleeves, but nothing that would call for sending it back. The color was true to the depiction online.

The marketing photo did *not* do this dress justice. At all. In person, it is WAY more stunning. I posted the marketing photo, then 2 photos I took. Huge difference. 😉👍 The fabric is perfect. A blend that is smooth, stretchy, yet thick enough to not be see through. I ordered the size large. I weigh about 159, and am 5'6" tall. It fit me perfectly. It skimmed in at the waist. It came down to about 5 or 6 inches off the floor. Flat sandals would be ideal. It has pockets on each side. Very very comfortable to wear.... for church, out to dinner, family gatherings, etc. I plan on wearing it to dinner on *non-formal* nights on a cruise. I highly recommend giving these dresses SERIOUS consideration!!!! 🌷
